text: The 2015 Blackburn with Darwen Borough Council election took place on 7th May 2015 to elect members of Blackburn with Darwen Borough Council in England. This was on the same day as other local elections. ==References== Category:2015 English local elections Category:May 2015 events in the United Kingdom 2015 Category:2010s in Lancashire
title: 2015 Blackburn with Darwen Borough Council election
